name: 鄧道興
objective: 介紹一階常微分方程式，線性常微分方程式，及解非均勻方程式的一般方法，以及Bessel與 Strum Liouville 問題,並介紹 Laplace轉換與數值分析。
schedule:
1.Introduction to Differential Equations
2.First-Order Differential Equations
3.Separable Variables; Linear Equations
4.Exact Equations; Solutions by Substitutions
5.A Numerical Method; Linear Models
6.Nonlinear Models
7.Modeling with Systems of First-Order DEs.
8.Higher-Order Differential Equations
9.Mid-term Exam
10.Reduction of Order
11.Homogeneous Linear Equations with Constant Coefficients
12.Undetermined Coefficients
13.Variation of Parameters
14.Cauchy-Euler Equation
15.Nonlinear Equations
16.Linear Models:Initial-Value Problems/Boundary-Value Problems
17.Solving Systems of Linear Equations
18.Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Term Performance Including Attendance and Homework(30%)
Mid-term Exam(35%)
Final Exam(35%)
materials:
Advanced Engineering Mathematics 4th Edition
Dennis G. Zill
Michael R. Cullen
